If you're interested in something more lighthearted and humorous, then "Hollywood Ending" (2002) starring Mark Rydell and Erica Leerhsen is a great choice. The film follows a director who is forced to work with his ex-wife, who left him for the boss of the studio bankrolling his new film.

If you're interested in something with a strong sense of humanity and empowerment, then "Girl, Interrupted" (1993) starring Henry Alex Rubin, Angela Bettis, and Bruce Altman is a great choice. The film follows a directionless teenager who is rushed to Claymoore, a mental institution, after a supposed suicide attempt.
